1.0.name: wordpress/smarter-archives
1.0.description:
This plugin provides you with a template tag for your archives page, which presents navigating the archives in a unique way. It has a row for each year during which you posted, and every month in that year during which you posted has a link. It is also built to be easy to style with CSS, and everything is semantic and has a CSS class.

The plugin's output is completely customizable (both HTML tags and CSS classes) and support for translations is built-in (domain is smarter-archives).

The idea and code was based on the original Smart Archives plugin by Justin Blanton.
